info.brief_description: Lion King characters are hungry... in more ways then one.
info.description:
So, you get to decide among the Lion King Characters who gets to consume and who gets consumed.

Things allowed in this story:
1. Soft vore (Oral, Breast and Anal)
2. Unbirth (Cock vore is allowed as long as it leads to a character getting sent to a females womb.
3. Anthro versions of the cast for one storyline.
4. Age regression.
5. Diapers (only in the Anthro version story line. And don't go into detail about diaper usage.)
6. Breastfeeding.
7. Having you become the main character for one storyline.
8. Shrinking of any character.
9. Pregnancy of course.
10. Adding OCs to the story.
11. Transformation
12. Lesbians, single or couple.
13. gender swap in the womb.
14. babying
15. including characters from the Lion Guard

Things not allowed in this story:
1. Hard vore.
2. Death.
3. Digestion or Absorbsion.
4. Blood and Gore. (Small mentions of one Character minor wounding another is okay.)
5. Torture
6. Herms.
7. Gay male couples.
8. gays males in general
9. gender swaps to make a gay couple.
10. gender swaps outside the womb.

If there are other things you may want to try that may not have been listed, feel free to ask me on online email. If rules are bent or broken, chapters will be deleted. Help me get to at least 60 chapters. thank you.
